phrases: OP
ED
This is the end!
Homura-chan?
You...
What the hell do you think you are doing?!
I see.
You are that irregular everyone is been talking about.
Using strange attacks like that...
Do not interfere!
Sayaka-chan!
Do not worry.
She is only unconscious.
Who the hell are you?
Whose side are you on?
I am the ally of rationality and the enemy of needless conflict.
Which might you be?
Sakura Kyoko...
Huh
Have we met?
Who knows?
I have no idea what you are trying to pull.
I will take my leave for now.
A wise choice.
Did you come here to save us?
How many times must I tell you before you understand?
How foolish can you be?
I have already warned you countless times...
If you intend to continue acting foolish...
Homura-chan, why?
Do not mind her.
She is surely planning something.
You must exercise caution.
Akemi Homura.
Are you...
We should be okay for a little longer.
Whoa, it is completely black.
That is bad.
If it continues to collect taint...
Do not worry.
Let me see it.
It should be fine, now.
Did you eat it?
This is my job as well.
However, in order to purify your Soul Gem any further,
you will need to find another Grief Seed.
Is it really that important to keep this thing purified?
Sakura Kyoko is powerful.
By keeping your Soul Gem pure, you can use as much magic as you please.
That is how Kyoko remains so powerful.
Still, I cannot just sacrifice a human being for the sake of a Grief Seed.
The more magic you use, the more your Grief Seed will become tainted.
Sayaka, if you do not collect any more Grief Seeds,
then there is no way you will defeat Kyoko.
Sheesh...
Is that really the only way?
Mami-san did not have that many Grief Seeds, did she?
But she was still able to fight.
That is the big difference between myself and her.
Well, that is true.
That sucks!
It is so unfair!
There is nothing we can do about it.
Kyoko is not only talented, but also a veteran.
You, on the other hand, have no experience.
However, if we were to compare talent, then there is someone who is more talented than Kyoko.
Oh?
And who is that?
Kaname Madoka-san.
Madoka...?
Are you serious?
Yes.
So if you truly wish to defeat Kyoko,
you would need to bring Madoka into the picture.
All she needs to do is form a contract with me.
No.
I cannot do that.
This is my fight.
I could not possibly drag her into this.
Yo.
What is it this time?
I want you to take this city.
The heck are you talking about?
Only you are worthy of the title Magical Girl.
Miki Sayaka will not be able to.
Well, that was according to plan.
But how should we deal with Sayaka?
If we leave her alone, she will just start another fight with me.
I am trying to think of a peaceful method.
Just stay put and leave the rest to me.
I have one last question for you.
Who are you?
What is your motive?
In two weeks Walpurgis Night will come to this city.
How do you know that?
That is a secret.
In any case, we just need to defeat her; then, I can leave this city.
After that, it is all on you.
Walpurgis Night, eh?
That is going to be difficult to handle on your own.
If we team up, we may have a chance.
Want one?
It is no use.
We have spent too much time here.
There is no way we can catch that familiar.
I see.
Hey, Sayaka-chan.
If you continue to search for Witches,
we will meet that girl again, will not we?
Yeah, we will.
So, if we do meet with her again,
could you two talk things over?
If not, you two will end up arguing again.
Arguing?
Is that really what you thought last night?
That was a fight to the death.
It was not that serious at the start.
But by the end, we just wanted to kill each other.
Do not do that again...
So you expect me to talk things over?
Do not be so dense.
She is someone who thinks of human beings as nothing more than a nest for Grief Seeds.
How do you expect us to calmly talk things over?
Sayaka-chan, you became a Magical Girl to hunt Witches, right?
She is not a Witch, but a Magical Girl like you.
If you two try, I know we can all be friends.
You may have different methods than she does, but you both want to hunt Witches.
The same goes for Homura-chan.
And Mami-san, too.
If she had not argued with Homura-chan...
That is wrong!
You saw what happened, Madoka.
She waited until Mami-san died before coming to defeat the Witch.
She wanted that Grief Seed so badly that she did not care if Mami-san died.
You are wrong...
That transfer student and Kyoko... they are both the same!
They only think about themselves.
I finally understand.
Mami-san was an exception.
Every other Magical Girl is the same.
No...
Even though that familiar was not powerful,
it could still kill someone!
You never know who its target may be.
It could even be your mom and dad.
It may even be Ta-kun!
Can you just let that happen, Madoka?
You will forgive them for doing that?
You know...
I am not just fighting Witches.
I am using my powers to protect those who are dear to me.
That is why...
I will fight them.
Even if it is a Magical Girl.
Sayaka-chan...
Say something, Kyubei!
All I can say is that it is very foolish.
Sayaka-chan has no chance of defeating Akemi Homura nor Sakura Kyoko.
But no matter how many times I tell her, she just will not listen.
Cannot sleep?
No.
Can we talk?
My friend is in trouble...
She does not seem to have any ill intentions.
But the more she tries to do the right thing, the worse it gets.
That happens a lot.
It is unfortunate, but when you do that, it does not always feel like you are doing the right thing.
If everyone were to do what they feel is right,
then there will be no more happiness.
She is not doing anything wrong, and yet she cannot find any happiness.
It is horrible.
What should I do?
Something like this is delicate, so I would suggest not interfering.
But even if it is not a perfect solution, you want to try, right?
Yeah...
Then you will need to do something wrong.
She is too thoughtful, and she needs someone to do something wrong for her.
Something wrong...?
Something like telling a lie or running away from something scary...
But you know,
after you did that, you will realize it was the right thing to do.
If you reach a point where you do not know what else you can do,
then you might as well do something wrong.
How will she know it is for her?
She will understand,
even if it is not immediately.
Like I said, it is not the perfect solution.
Would you rather give up on her or be misunderstood every now and then?
Madoka.
You are a good kid.
You do not tell lies and you do not do anything wrong.
You have been trying to do the right thing.
You have already succeeded as a child.
So, before you become an adult,
you need to learn when to do something wrong.
Learn... when to do something wrong...?
As a kid, you heal quickly.
Take advantage of that and use your time to make mistakes.
You will find it useful someday.
When you are older,
it will be harder to make those mistakes.
As our responsibilities increase, so does the need for caution.
Is not that hard?
Adults lead difficult lives.
That is why they drink their sorrows away.
I would like to drink sake with you, too, someday.
Is that so?
Then hurry and grow up already.
It has its rough times, but it is still fun.
If you are looking for Kamijou-san, he was discharged yesterday.
The rehabilitation was successful,
so the treatment was completed early.
I-Is that so?
You are going to head home already?
You have chased him around all day, though.
You...
I know all about this guy.
He is the reason why you formed a contract with Kyubei.
Man...
Using your only chance to wish for something on this.
What would someone like you know?
You are the only one who does not understand, idiot.
The reason magic exists is so that our deepest desires may become a reality.
It is worthless if you use it on someone else.
Did not Tomoe Mami tell you that?
Are not there easier methods of getting a guy?
Just use the magic that you worked so hard to obtain.
What?
Go inside and break his arms and legs so that he cannot play the violin anymore.
Make it so that he will need your help to do anything.
That way, he will be all yours.
Be it his heart or his body, it is all yours.
If you are too much of a wimp, then I will do it for you.
Consider it a favor from another Magical Girl.
It is no big deal.
There is no way...
There is no way I will let that slide...
This time...
Let us change our location, then.
Otherwise, people will see us.
She is too thoughtful, and she needs someone to do something wrong for her.
What can I possibly do...?
Madoka.
Madoka!
Quickly, Sayaka's in trouble!
Follow me.
There is no need to hold back.
Let us have some fun.
Wait, Sayaka-chan!
M-Madoka?!
Get out of here, this does not involve you.
I cannot do that!
This is not right!
Well, I guess annoying people have annoying friends.
What are you trying to say?
Did not we discuss this?
I told you not to do anything to Miki Sayaka.
Your way of doing things is too slow for me.
Besides, she is as ready as I am.
Then I will take care of her.
Do not interfere.
I am jumping in when I finish this.
That is long enough.
Who the hell do you think you are?!
I am sorry, Sayaka-chan!
Madoka, what are you doing!?
But if I do not...
Sayaka-chan?
That was really bad, Madoka.
You just threw away your friend.
Are not you going to do something?
What?
What happened?
Stop!
What the hell is this...?
Is she dead?!
Sayaka-chan...
Hey, Sayaka-chan.
Hey, wake up!
Hey... come on.
Hey, what is happening?!
I did not want this to happen!
Sayaka-chan!
What the fuck is going on...?
Hey!
A Magical Girl can only control their bodies within a 100 meter radius.
100 meters?
What the hell is that supposed to mean?!
You would normally keep your body nearby.
So this sort of thing rarely happens.
What are you saying, Kyubei?!
Please, save her!
I do not want Sayaka-chan to die!
Madoka, that person is not Sayaka, it is merely a hollow she will.
You just threw the real Sayaka away.
W-What are you saying...?
If you were to use a human being's body,
then there would be no way for you to fight Witches.
For Magical Girls like yourselves, your original body is merely hardware.
It serves as a container for your soul, allowing you to channel magic efficiently.
Therefore, your soul is stored somewhere more compact and safe.
As the one responsible for forming contracts with Magical Girls,
my job is to remove your souls and exchange them for Soul Gems.
You little bastard...
What the hell?!
Stop fucking around.
We are basically just zombies then, are not we?!
Do not you think that is better?
If you get stabbed in the heart, or if you lose all the blood in your body...
You can just use magic to fix your body.
So long as your Soul Gem is there, you will never die.
This is much more effective than using an actual human body in a fight, no?
That is terrible...
How could you possibly...?
Why are you girls always like this?
Whenever I tell the truth, you react the same way.
I just do not get it.
Why do humans care so much about where their soul resides?
What?
What happened?
You had a wish you wanted to grant so badly that you would even accept your fate as a Magical Girl, right?
Well, have I not granted you that wish?
Can I face my true feelings?
